Uses of Class
trashday.storage.SessionDao

  • Packages that use SessionDao 
    Package Description
    trashday.storage
    Provides the classes necessary to store user information in the Alexa session and Amazon Dynamo DB.
    trashday.ui.responses
    Organizes all the functions that provide voice responses to the user.

    • Uses of SessionDao in trashday.storage

      Methods in trashday.storage with parameters of type SessionDao 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DynamoDao.appendIntentLogData(SessionDao sessionDao, IntentLog intentLog)
      Appends given user intent log data into this user's Dynamo DB entry log data.
      void DynamoDao.eraseUserData(SessionDao sessionDao)
      Delete all user data when the clear their entire schedule.
      boolean DynamoDao.readUserData(SessionDao sessionDao)
      Reads user data from Dynamo DB and stores in the SessionDao.
      void DynamoDao.writeUserData(SessionDao sessionDao)
      Saves user data from the SessionDao into the Dynamo DB.

    • Uses of SessionDao in trashday.ui.responses

      Methods in trashday.ui.responses with parameters of type SessionDao 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse ResponsesSchedule.askScheduleChange(SessionDao sessionDao, boolean withHelpCard)
      Respond when user gives "update schedule" command.
      static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse ResponsesSchedule.askScheduleEmpty(SessionDao sessionDao, boolean withHelpCard)
      Respond when user attempts something that requires a schedule, but that schedule is empty, tell them and give help on how to add pickups to make a schedule.
      static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse ResponsesSchedule.askTimeZoneMissing(SessionDao sessionDao, boolean withHelpCard)
      Respond when user attempts something that requires a time zone, but that time zone is missing.
      static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse ResponsesExit.buildExitResponse(SessionDao sessionDao)
      Our standard application exit response is just a "Goodbye" from Alexa without any associated Card.

      Respond when user tries to delete an entire pickup from the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name.
      static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse ResponsesSchedule.respondEntirePickupDeleteMissingName(SessionDao sessionDao, boolean withHelpCard)
      Respond when user tries to delete entire pickup from the schedule but is missing essential data like pickup name.
      static com.amazon.speech.speechlet.SpeechletResponse ResponsesHelp.respondHelp(SessionDao sessionDao, boolean withHelpCard, boolean nonEmptyScheduleExists)
      Our standard help response is a verbal and Card response text.

      Respond when user tries to add a pickup time to the schedule but gave invalid data for required fields like pickup name, day of week, or time of day.

      Respond with an "Are you sure?" when user requests to delete the entire schedule.
